title: 98/12/EC: Commission Decision of 15 December 1997 amending for the fourth time Council Directive 82/894/EEC on the notification of animal diseases within the Community and temporarily amending the frequency of notification for bovine spongiform encephalopathy (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 15 December 1997 amending for the fourth time Council Directive 82/894/EEC on the notification of animal diseases within the Community and temporarily amending the frequency of notification for bovine spongiform encephalopathy (Text with EEA relevance) (98/12/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: 'Bovine spongiform encephalopathy` is hereby added to Annex I to Directive 82/894/EEC.

By way of a derogation from Article 3 (1) of Directive 82/894/EEC, all outbreaks of bovine spongiform encephalopathy shall be notified until 31 December 2002 in accordance with Article 4 of that Directive.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
